name: 陳志誠
objective:
各種冷煤壓縮機簡介，容積式壓縮機效率分析，離心式壓縮機分析，各種送風機簡介，送風機應用，泵之應用分析。
Introduction to refrigerant compressors, efficiency analysis of volumetric compressors, analysis of centrifugal compressors, introduction to fans, applications of fans, and application of pumps.
